abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox retire number 45, which was worn by pitcher Pedro Martinez; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago scored five runs in the first inning to rain on Boston’s parade, as Jose Abreu and Geovany Soto homered and drove in three runs each.

headline.main: Red Sox Retire Pedro Martinez’s Number, Then Fall to White Sox
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Retire Martinez’s Number, Then Fall to White Sox

snippet: Chicago scored five runs in the first inning to rain on Boston’s parade, as Jose Abreu and Geovany Soto homered and drove in three runs each.
